0100111001101010_1100110010001000
2. ror r3, r5; strb r2, r7, r2
0101110101101011_1010110101101000
3. and r1, r2; B 00000000;
0000000000011011_0100010110001000

4. sub r6, 00000000; Jump 00000000010
0000000011000101_1111111001011110
5. nop_ldrb r5, r6, r7

with hazards
6. add r5, r4; branch 00000010
0000001000011011_1001010010001000
7. and r4, r5; ldrb r4, r4, r0
0001001001101010_1011000110001000
8. sub r2, 11111111 strb r2, r4, r5

9. ror r2, r4; branch 00000000
